name: vs-marketplace-cursor-button-adder
description: Adds a 'Install in Cursor' button next to VS Code install buttons in the VS Marketplace

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json content.js styles.css jquery-3.7.1.slim.min.js dist/ && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip * && cd ../ && rm -rf dist && mv extension.zip cursor-to-vsmarket.zip

author: Your Name
